com.anji.nn.activationfunction

Interface ActivationFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteActivationFunction, BipolarSigmoidActivationFunction, ClampedAbsoluteActivationFunction, ClampedLinearActivationFunction, ConvertToSignedActivationFunction, CosineActivationFunction, DivideActivationFunction, EvSailSigmoidActivationFunction, GaussianActivationFunction, InverseAbsActivationFunction, LinearActivationFunction, LogicActivationFunction, LogicAndActivationFunction, LogicOrActivationFunction, LogicXORActivationFunction, NegatedLinearActivationFunction, RampActivationFunction, SigmoidActivationFunction, SignedClampedLinearActivationFunction, SignedStepActivationFunction, SineActivationFunction, StepActivationFunction, TanhActivationFunction, TanhCubicActivationFunction

    public interface ActivationFunction
    Abstracts activation function for neurons.
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
